interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: TIANG Facial Steamer, Nano Ionic Mist Face Steamer, Hydrating Mist Sprayer Water Oxygen Injection, Nano Steamer Portable Mist Humidifier, for Face Mini Spa Rejuvenation, Moisturizing Refreshing Review Date: 2021/08/21 Store: TIANG Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'TIANG', 'Item Form': 'Liquid, Oil, Lotion, Spray', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 1.61 x 1.61 inches; 6.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '757249753050'} Review Text: I absolutely love these types of nano facial misters and have purchased quite a few over the last 6 months or so both higher and lower end. This TIANG one is about mid level price wise, but I actually thing this works better in a lot of aspects than my more expensive one that costs about 2x the price!

My favorite facial mister prior to this was the Flight Mode Cloud Mister which is usually between $40-$50 depending on if it’s on sale or not at that time. And personally I think this TIANG one works even better!

First you can actually put an watery essence in this TIANG one, unlike the Flight mode one that doesn’t allow it. This TIANG one also has a better spray than my flight mode one. The flight mode one is insanely fine, honestly it’s actually to fine but it was still my favorite up until now. This TIANG one is slightly stronger of a spray which is enough to really mist your face without feeling like you dumping skincare or water on your skin. This TIANG one also holds a charge longer and I can easily get a day or two out of it even if I am using it frequently throughout the day.

The only real negative is the size of this TIANG one bits much larger than my old one and most of the others I have tried. But other than that this is a fantastic machine and I would highly recommend! Sometimes it’s the really simple things that work best! Review Title: Works better than ones that cones nearly 2x the price Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
TINY BUDDHA Mindfulness Gift Set Includes Soothing Bath and Shower Gel, Relaxing Pillow Spray, Calming Essential Oil Roll-On, Lychee Flower Scented Candle and Daily Mindfulness Practice Guide Tiny Buddha {'Brand': 'Tiny Buddha', 'Special Feature': 'Scented', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 8.07 x 2.52 inches; 1.45 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'KMI Brands'} While I really like this Tiny Buddha Mindfullness set, mine came completely soaked, so much that the box was falling apart. The culprit was the pillow spray that had leaked almost completely out since the lid wasn’t on securely. Which is a shame because I absolutely love pillow sprays and use them every single night, and this one smelled really good.

That being said the rest of the set was just ok for me. The candle does smell good, but it is super tiny and only burned for a few hours before it was gone. The shower gel smells amazing, but didn’t lather as well as I hoped and the scent didn’t linger. And the essential oil roll on was alright, though it smelled kind of musty or something. I would have given this 4 stars if the pillow spray wasn’t leaked everywhere, but it was, so only 3 stars. Pillow spray leaked everywhere, but it smelled really good MINETAN BODY.SKIN Tan Booster Foam - Boosts Color Results for Deeper, Darker, Longer Lasting Results, 10.14 fl oz {'Brand': 'MINETAN BODY.SKIN', 'Product Benefits': 'Suits all skin types & tones for those wanting to boost the results from their self tan with illuminating results.Suits all skin types & tones for those wanting to boost the results from their self tan with illuminating results. See more', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Item Weight': '0.36 Kilograms', 'Product Dimensions': '21.26 x 21.26 x 87.4 inches; 12.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MIH201905'} I have been using Minetan products for a few years now almost exclusively, so it goes without saying that I love most of there products! This Minetan tan booster mousse has a light foamy texture and goes on clear. It definitely helps your sunless tanner last longer and is decently moisturizing.

Honestly I do like this mousse, but I personally prefer Minetan tan extending lotion to this mousse. The mousse seams to me to have a little bit of stiffness and stickiness when I put it on my skin. I do still like the mousse, but I would take there lotion over this if given the choice. But still a good product! I think it’s more personal preference as I prefer the brands lotion tanning products to there mousse ones. Great product! Oreola Fish Line Hair Extensions Real Human Hair Natural Black Wire Hair Extensions Straight Hairpiece for Women #1B 20inch 120G Oreola {'Brand': 'Oreola', 'Color': '#1B Natural Black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Oreola'} The hair itself is actually gorgeous on this Oreola Halo hair extensions. It’s very high quality and the color is not one monotone color, but instead multiple colors and is blended together beautifully. I have a bit of experience with these types of wigs and I find them the easiest for me for quick application. Once you get the hang of putting these on you can do it pretty quick, just watch lots of tutorials on utube and you will be a pro in no time!

The only critique I have is that I wish the hair were just a bit thicker. It’s gorgeous hair and it’s nice and long and easy to work with, but it’s just not very thick. Which kind of limits who can use it. If you have short hair that’s above chin length then this will not work for you. But overall it’s still great quality and I’m happy with it! Beautiful hair and well made ikoo E-Styler Pro Heated Hair Styling Brush for Women, Thermal & Ceramic, Straightens & Creates Waves, Rotating Power Cable, Auto-Off, One-Touch-Navigation for Easy Heat Control - Beluga Black ikoo {'Brand': 'Ikoo', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Auto-off', 'Product Dimensions': '13.03 x 4.53 x 3.35 inches; 2.01 Pounds'} I have tried quite a lot of electric styling brushes over the last few years, and I have to say that this is definitely the best designed and overall best one I have used. The design of it with the grooves on the sides makes it so that your hair doesn’t tangle or wave awkwardly. It fells solid and seams to be good quality overall.

This IMO E-styler isn’t going to give you stick straight hair like a straightener would, but it does work very well for giving you a more natural looking straightness without making your hair look thin, unlike a traditional straightener.

On the flip side, it is not going to give you tighter curls, it’s more for waves and again more natural looking waves. But it does do waves very well.

It’s definitely unique and I have never seen one quite like this. But that’s not a bad thing! As long as your aware of what it can and can’t do and the types of styles it can produce, then you will be happy with it! Overall it’s pricy, but I like it a lot! Very unique and excels at natural looking straightening and waves Florona Hibiscus Air Freshener Room Spray for Deep Sleep 100 ml - Pure & Unrefined Pillow Mist & Linen Spray (Hibiscus,100 ml) FLORONA {'Package Dimensions': '5.75 x 1.73 x 1.69 inches; 4.73 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'FLORONA'} Not really a fan of this Florona Hibiscus room freshener. First it claims to be a room and pillow spray, but it’s not, or at least this scent isn’t. It’s not relaxing at all and it’s way to strong for a pillow spray.

Generally I love hibiscus scents, but there is just something really off about this one, it’s almost perfume like. Plus the sprayer nozzle on this is terrible. It shouts out huge droplets that splatter everywhere and leak down the container and onto my hand every time. They put two different caps on this, but then the sprayer is terrible… why? Overall I was just really unimpressed by this. I have tried other products from this brand like there essential oils, and I have generally liked them. But this is just a huge miss for me. Terrible spray nozzle and scent is more like perfume TIANG Facial Steamer, Nano Ionic Mist Face Steamer, Hydrating Mist Sprayer Water Oxygen Injection, Nano Steamer Portable Mist Humidifier, for Face Mini Spa Rejuvenation, Moisturizing Refreshing TIANG {'Brand': 'TIANG', 'Item Form': 'Liquid, Oil, Lotion, Spray', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 1.61 x 1.61 inches; 6.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '757249753050'} I absolutely love these types of nano facial misters and have purchased quite a few over the last 6 months or so both higher and lower end. This TIANG one is about mid level price wise, but I actually thing this works better in a lot of aspects than my more expensive one that costs about 2x the price!

My favorite facial mister prior to this was the Flight Mode Cloud Mister which is usually between $40-$50 depending on if it’s on sale or not at that time. And personally I think this TIANG one works even better!

First you can actually put an watery essence in this TIANG one, unlike the Flight mode one that doesn’t allow it. This TIANG one also has a better spray than my flight mode one. The flight mode one is insanely fine, honestly it’s actually to fine but it was still my favorite up until now. This TIANG one is slightly stronger of a spray which is enough to really mist your face without feeling like you dumping skincare or water on your skin. This TIANG one also holds a charge longer and I can easily get a day or two out of it even if I am using it frequently throughout the day.

The only real negative is the size of this TIANG one bits much larger than my old one and most of the others I have tried. But other than that this is a fantastic machine and I would highly recommend! Sometimes it’s the really simple things that work best! Works better than ones that cones nearly 2x the price
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Mindfulness Focus:** The user maintains a strong interest in mindfulness and relaxation products, particularly those with diverse aromatic elements to enhance well-being.

- **Aromatherapy Preference:** Continues a nightly routine with pillow sprays aimed at promoting calmness, emphasizing the importance of quality for sleep-enhancing products.

- **Quality Expectations:** Expects high standards and expresses disappointment with durability and effectiveness issues, especially concerning scent intensity and longevity, noting dissatisfaction with overly strong fragrances.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** Sensitive to musty or unpleasant fragrances, which negatively impacts product satisfaction, particularly when fragrances are overly perfume-like.

- **Mixed Product Experiences:** Exhibits a balanced view on efficacy, focusing on practical concerns like product size, effectiveness, functionality, and spray mechanisms.

- **Moderate Satisfaction Rating:** This critical outlook informs their lower satisfaction ratings, underscoring the need for consistent quality.

- **Tanning Product Enthusiasm:** Enjoys moisturizing tanning products and favors comfortable skincare textures.

- **Hair Extensions Interest:** Values high-quality hair extensions, showing discernment regarding thickness and application ease.

- **Styling Tool Appreciation:** Has invested in a heated styling brush, seeking innovative design for natural hairstyles while being aware of limitations.

- **Emerging Preference for Functionality:** Recently showcased a strong appreciation for effective product functionality, particularly regarding spray delivery mechanisms and overall performance in facial care items, highlighting a shift towards practicality in product selection.
